markdownRemark.excerpt: In the same vein of applying  harsh self criticism : Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than…
markdownRemark.html:
In the same vein of applying harsh self criticism:

Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful people with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent. — Calvin Coolidge

via A Photo Editor

frontmatter.title: Nothing Is More Common Than Unsuccessful People With Talent
Music Of The Day: TV on the Radio
